eu.linksmart.caf.daqc
Interface DataAcquisitionComponent

All Superinterfaces:
EventSubscriber, java.rmi.Remote
public interface DataAcquisitionComponent
extends EventSubscriber, java.rmi.Remote

The interface for the Data Acquisition Component.

Provides functionalities for subscribing to the DAqC with DaqcSubscriptions, and well as the means for cancelling Subscriptions.

Author:
Michael Crouch

Method Summary
 boolean cancelSubscription(java.lang.String protocol, java.lang.String subscriberHid, java.lang.String dataId)

Method Detail

subscribe

DaqcSubscriptionResponse subscribe(DaqcSubscription daqcSub)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Subscribes for all data specified by the Subscriptions in the DaqcSubscription.

The returned DaqcSubscriptionResponse contains the status of each Subscription.

Parameters:
daqcSub - the DaqcSubscription
Returns:
the DaqcSubscriptionResponse
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

cancelSubscription

boolean cancelSubscription(java.lang.String protocol,
                           java.lang.String subscriberHid,
                           java.lang.String dataId)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Cancels the Subscription with the given dataId, for the subscriber with the given Hid, from the specified protocol.

Parameters:
protocol - the protocol id
subscriberHid - the HID of the Subscriber
dataId - the Data Id
Returns:
success
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
